name: Motherly
description:
This game was made for The Spooktober 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam by DevTalk

"Quione starts questioning her role as a mother after disturbing events force her to choose between her two sons."

The story has two endings
Over 9000 words (around 1 hour of gameplay)
5 original sound tracks
65 sprites
9 backgrounds (with time of day variations)

Game by: MskullsGames
Script by: MustacheSkulls and TeasingMasterVi
Editor: SacrificedToRNG
Composer: EltonMso
Background art by: SortrosPhoresia, Cehamato, TeasingMasterVi and MustacheSkulls
Sprite Art, GUI, CG art by: MustacheSkulls

For MAC:
If you are running iOS and are experiencing problems opening game with an error related to your security settings, please see this Apple support article for a simple solution. 

*obs: The skip button doesn't work sometimes and the icon is still not there as well. But we plan to update the game after SpooktoberJam is over!
